## ValueType type

Database value type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ValueType = ("DECIMAL" | "TINY" | "SHORT" | "LONG" | "FLOAT" | "DOUBLE" | "NULL" | "TIMESTAMP" | "LONGLONG" | "INT24" | "DATE" | "TIME" | "DATETIME" | "YEAR" | "NEWDATE" | "VARCHAR" | "BIT" | "JSON" | "NEWDECIMAL" | "ENUM" | "SET" | "TINY_BLOB" | "MEDIUM_BLOB" | "LONG_BLOB" | "BLOB" | "VAR_STRING" | "STRING" | "GEOMETRY");
```
